To me, it almost… [+3270 chars]

articles.title: Everton 1-0 Chelsea: Sigurdsson penalty punishes Mendy error - Goal.com
articles.description: Pep Guardiola believes Mikel Arteta is the right man to lead Arsenal despite their awful start to the 2020-21 Premier League season.
